about_the_game:
Modern Suburbs, a great setting for anything from (A)liens to (Z)ombies. Quiet streets , small towns, the crash location of a helicopter carrying a virus.. unleash your creativity in a whole new mapping genre! Mix Modern Towns and Dungeons together to make millions of new maps. You can even mix the Modern Towns with all other DLC for unlimited map making power!

Virtual Battlemap is also great for staging the atmosphere of your game, even if you don't use it for mapping. Give your characters a detailed look at the world they are playing in, excite their imaginations!

  • Over 160 new map building assets
  • 5 new panels FULL of Modern Town building content
  • Vehicles.. Cars, Trucks, Helicopters, Tanks and more!
  • More Ground Texture Options
  • More Decal Texture Options
  • *** FREE ***
detailed_description:
Modern Suburbs, a great setting for anything from (A)liens to (Z)ombies. Quiet streets , small towns, the crash location of a helicopter carrying a virus.. unleash your creativity in a whole new mapping genre! Mix Modern Towns and Dungeons together to make millions of new maps. You can even mix the Modern Towns with all other DLC for unlimited map making power!

Virtual Battlemap is also great for staging the atmosphere of your game, even if you don't use it for mapping. Give your characters a detailed look at the world they are playing in, excite their imaginations!

  • Over 160 new map building assets
  • 5 new panels FULL of Modern Town building content
  • Vehicles.. Cars, Trucks, Helicopters, Tanks and more!
  • More Ground Texture Options

name: Virtual Battlemap DLC - Modern Town

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista and Above
  • Processor: Intel 2.4 Ghz Dual Core or AMD Athlon 2.6 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 4870/5770/6770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 260/460/550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Higher quality map exports require more ram.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/i7 or AMD Phenom II x4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 7870/R9 270 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 Ti/760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Higher quality map exports require more ram.

short_description: Modern Suburbs, a great setting for anything from (A)liens to (Z)ombies. Quiet streets , small towns, the crash location of a helicopter carrying a virus.. unleash your creativity in a whole new mapping genre!
